name: Magento 2 Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Magento 2 Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Magento API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Magento API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: customer

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many products

firstname.name: firstname
firstname.description: First name of the user to create
firstname.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | 作用: First name of the user to create | (必填项)

lastname.name: lastname
lastname.description: Last name of the user to create
lastname.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | 作用: Last name of the user to create | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: attribute_set_id (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
type_id (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

customerId.name: customerId
customerId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Customer ID | (必填项)

website_id.name: website_id
website_id.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
website_id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Website Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: attribute_set_id (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
type_id (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 5

filterType.name: filterType
filterType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter | 默认值: none

matchType.name: matchType
matchType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Must Match | 默认值: anyFilter

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

jsonNotice.displayName: See Magento guide to creating filters
jsonNotice.name: jsonNotice
jsonNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: See Magento guide to creating filters

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}

orderId.name: orderId
orderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Order ID | (必填项)

sku.name: sku
sku.natural_language_description: 参数名: SKU | 作用: Stock-keeping unit of the product | (必填项)

attributeSetId.name: attributeSetId
attributeSetId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
attributeSetId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attribute Set Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

price.name: price
price.natural_language_description: 参数名: Price | 默认值: 0
